Posts.Content: I had breast conserving surgery and offered radiotherapy. Waiting to see oncologist to discuss it. I also have Chronic Fatigue Syndrome and mobility problems so I am very concerned about how I'll cope with radiotherapy and all the travelling. My hospital is about 2 1/2 hours away. Has anyone had experience of switching hospitals after surgery to get radiotherapy? I could stay with relatives and be just 20 minutes away from their hospital....
Posts.Title: change hospitals for radiotherapy?
